info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: Flesh Idol
collection.openText: And the prayer shall inevitably end with the eternal despair of its worshipper.

specialTipSize.specialTip: $0’s effect can manifest through prayer. The one who prays will receive damage of a random type at regular intervals.
<Experiment 1> The subject prayed for a duration of 20 seconds or less. They died.
<Experiment 2> The subject prayed for a duration between 21 to 45 seconds. During this timeframe, all employees other than the subject recovered HP.
<Experiment 3> The subject prayed for a duration between 46 to 90 seconds. The results were similar to Experiment 2, but SP was also recovered.
<Experiment 4> The subject prayed for a duration longer than 90 seconds. They died, AND the Qliphoth Counters of all Abnormalities dropped to zero.
